attributes.action: Cap the energy rises and make the energy companies take the hit not the consumer
attributes.additional_details: Because the country is facing rising costs in everything, people are now choosing whether to eat or heat their homes. Mortgage prices are increasing and this is the nail in the coffin for many people. We cannot survive like this as a nation, take a note from France's book and cap the rise at 4% not 54% and hit the energy companies hard. Stop making us working people take the hit.
attributes.background: The government have the power to cap the rises and force the energy companies to take a hit. We as the consumers cannot afford these rises. We also don't want your £200 'help' it's not help, it's a loan which no one wants. We want a reduction in prices

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

Subsidise energy prices to offset any increase in the energy price cap
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586

Allow consumers the right to refuse the £200 energy rebate
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608007
